selectquality.quality: Poor Self Control (Compulsive III, Public Broad Aspect)

quality.name: Cold-Blooded
quality.notes: If a character with this quality is wearing a suitable piece of clothing/armor (such as a jacket) with the Insulation modification, then the negative effects are reduced. For the purposes of this negative quality, rating 4 Insulation or higher allows you to treat the temperature as up to ten degrees warmer, while rating 6 Insulation allows you to treat the temperature as up to twenty degrees warmer.

quality.name: Better to be Feathered Than Loved
Echo Chamber
quality.notes: When Matrix Searching, the character benefits from a +2 dice pool bonus, but the number of rolls needed to get a glitch is decreased by 1.

quality.name: Pie Iesu Domine. Dona Eis Requiem.
Infected Optional Power: Enhanced Sense (Thermographic Vision)
